content.content: If you have recently reported the result of an ECM proteomics study and would like to have your data integrated in MatrisomeDB, please contact us at below email
If your data are already despotited in a public repository member of the ProteomeXchange consortium such as PRIDE or MASSIVE, please send us the repository ID and a copy of your original publication.
If your data is not deposited in a public repository, please contact us and we will send you a link to upload the data.
Your data will help other researchers in the field to conduct better research.
